title: New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park Daily Walking Tours      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM,2:30 PM to 3:30 PM Location: National Park Visitor Center  Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/28/2016 to 09/05/2016 New Bedford has a fascinating history, filled with stories of whalemen, escaped slaves seeking freedom, and connections to the sea that span for centuries. With all the stories to tell, New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park has free guided tours. View Details      New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park Thursday Evenings in the Park      Time: 6:30 PM to 7:30 PM Location: Visitor Center Garden - 33 William St., downtown New Bedford Fees: FREE     Thursday, August 18, 2016 Every Thursday Weekly  from 07/14/2016 to 08/25/2016 Free Thursday evening concert series View Details      New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park Yoga in the Garden      Location: National Park Visitor Center 33 William St. New Bedford, MA 02740 Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Summertime is the perfect time to get outside and exercise and what better way to do that than joining us for yoga in the park!
